Sentencas: One step formation of NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-x is realized by auto-combustion method.
Titulo: Structural changes in NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-x anode under reducing atmosphere

Sentencas: Subsequently the powders are reduced by hydrogen at 500, 700 and 900 degrees C. X-ray diffraction (XRD) and transmission electron microscopy (TEM) confirmed the reduction of NiO to Ni at mentioned temperatures.
Titulo: Structural changes in NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-x anode under reducing atmosphere

Sentencas: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS) results show higher selectivity reaction of NiO to Ni at elevated temperature in hydrogen stream which may trigger the reduction of Ce4+ to Ce3+.
Titulo: Structural changes in NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-x anode under reducing atmosphere

Sentencas: Reduction of oxygen lattice as well as increment of Ce3+ in Ce oxide structure in a reducing atmosphere demonstrate formation of higher oxygen vacancies concentration at lower temperatures.
Titulo: Structural changes in NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-x anode under reducing atmosphere
